title:
Stochastic homogenization for two dimensional Navier--Stokes equations
  with random coefficients
authors: Dong Su and Hui Liu and Yangyang Shi
abstract:
This paper derives the stochastic homogenization for two dimensional
Navier--Stokes equations with random coefficients. By means of weak convergence
method and Stratonovich--Khasminskii averaging principle approach, the solution
of two dimensional Navier--Stokes equations with random coefficients converges
in distribution to the solution of two dimensional Navier--Stokes equations
with constant coefficients.
